text:
I didn't much like a lot of this soundtrack, admittedly.  The Capcom character themes especially felt bad compared to the originals.

But the Marvel themes are wonderful.  This is hardly my favourite of them, but it's still great.

text: @thedonoftrek Lol, I know right? Never is my best guess; Rare was bought by Microsoft, and most of its best employees quit. To top it off, Microsoft is using Rare to develop Kinect Sports;Rare's confirmed that before development of KS, they were making a Perfect Dark sequel and a Kameo2 at the very least;the only two things that they could say that would piss me off more would be that they canned a Banjo4 and KI3. Best case scenario, Rare sells the rights to their games to a company that cares.

author: daneofurexistence

text:
Jesus, what is with this video already 7 comments in loaded with hatred and arguing? What happened to "Oh yeah I love this game! Let's talk about this game!" or praising said game, etc, etc. I personally enjoyed this game. Admittingly not as much as 2, but even if this isn't anywhere near as deep as past entries or SF or whatever, doesn't mean you don't have fun picking a character you like and kicking ass with them.
Seriously, everyone stop getting so upset and just enjoy the music.
author: Arc13

text: @SegaRising Correction, The Corrupted Rare no longer cares. Since the buy out and the fact over 70% of the original staff at Rare all left, I no longer consider them Rare so much as a company that attempts to be them.
